sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Joan Crawford, Douglas Fairbanks Jr, Anita Page, Rod La Rocque
Director: Jack Conway
üçïPresented with the original synchronized orchestral score and sound effectsüçï
Step back into the glamour of the Roaring Twenties with a dazzling romantic melodrama brimming with passion, scandal, and jazz-age decadence!

The luminous Joan Crawford leads a stellar cast‚Äîfeaturing Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Anita Page, and Rod La Rocque‚Äîin a tale of love, deception, and the pursuit of happiness. As romance and ambition collide, secrets unravel, and hearts are tested in a world of privilege and excess.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: Young vivacious Billie uses her charms on influential businessman Glenn Abbott in hopes of getting her secret fianc√©e Gil a diplomatic appointment. Meanwhile Gil's affections meander to beautiful ingenue Kentucky, Billie's best friend. After securing Gil's appointment, Abbott is crushed to learn of Billie's impending marriage. What Billie didn't count on was Gil getting Kentucky pregnant. This throws her wedding day into scandal and creates turmoil in the lives of the youthful quartet.
metadata.Writer: Josephine Lovett, Marian Ainslee, Ruth Cummings
metadata.Actors: Joan Crawford, Rod La Rocque, Douglas Fairbanks Jr.
